title: Learn the meaning of eggs in a dream: Seeing yourself collecting eggs in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about eggs by Ibn Sirin? Interpretation of dreams: Eggs in a dream: Money is declared forbidden if the fortuneteller eats it while it is corrupt. Eating raw eggs indicates worries and problems to which the dreamer is exposed. A person’s dream in a dream is a chick laying an egg, this indicates that there will be childbirth in the near future. Seeing a chick laying a lot of eggs indicates the number of children the dreamer will have. Interpretation of a dream about eggs by Al-Nabulsi: A person’s dream that he has a lot of eggs indicates that he has a lot of money, but he is afraid of losing it. A single man who dreams of a lot of eggs is evidence that he will get married soon. Boiled or cooked eggs in a dream indicate praiseworthy events that the dreamer is going through. Boiled eggs in a dream indicate a lot of sustenance and good condition for the pioneer. Seeing broken eggs indicates the death of one of the dreamer’s children. Seeing a dream about eggs by Ibn Shaheen. Seeing that a person gets 4 eggs or More evidence that he will get a lot of halal money. If he sees that he took eggs from a stranger, this indicates the dreamer’s marriage to a beautiful girl. If the dreamer sees that he is laying eggs and hatching chicks, this is good news about a lot of money that the dreamer will receive. A single woman’s dream of an egg in a dream: An unmarried girl dreams that she will meet Eggs This indicates marriage in the near future. A girl’s dream of buying an egg in a dream Details of her marriage to a suitable person that she will meet soon. Seeing eggs in the home is a sign of good health and elegance. What is the interpretation of a dream about eggs for a married woman If a married woman sees that she is buying eggs in a dream, this means that she will earn a lot of money in the near future. Seeing broken eggs is a sign that trouble will happen to her at home. Raw eggs indicate that her husband’s money is being spent on useless things. If she takes Eggs from her husband in a dream, this indicates good news about pregnancy in the near future. What is the interpretation of a dream about eggs for a pregnant woman? Bird eggs in a pregnant woman’s dream indicate prosperity and happiness. I mean eggs in a pregnant woman’s dream in general, easy childbirth. A dream of being inside an egg store Evidence of success and excellence. What is the interpretation of a man’s dream of eggs? A dream of eggs in a man’s dream indicates a new job that the dreamer will obtain. A man dreams that he has a lot of eggs, and this indicates a lot of money that he possesses and he is afraid of losing it. If a young man sees a large amount of eggs, This means that he will get married soon. If he sees that he is giving the daughter an egg, this indicates the death and injury of the son. If a man sees that he has a large number of eggs and his wife is already pregnant, this indicates that she will give birth to children with this number of eggs. A man dreams that he is carrying a boiled egg in His hand, and this indicates good circumstances. The dream of eating raw eggs indicates anxiety and sadness. The meaning and symbols of seeing eggs in a dream. Fried eggs symbolize natural birth. A pregnant woman passes through the dream, and the dream is also an indication of the birth of a woman. Fried eggs in a dream for an unborn girl

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a dead person laughing with me according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Many people feel anxious and stressed when they see a dead person in their dreams, even if that person is related to them. But it is possible that this anxiety and tension will go away if the deceased laughs with the fortuneteller. A different online page will explain to its readers the interpretation of a dream about death laughing at me.Interpretation of a dream about death laughing at me. Many people ask about what is the interpretation of a dream about death laughing at me? Many dream interpreters answered that seeing the dead laughing in a dream is a good vision that expresses the condition of the deceased in his final rest and that the vision is news for the living to reassure their dead relatives for their own good. The situation and happiness they enjoy now. It can also be a sign of kindness or sustenance for the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about the dead laughing with meIf someone sees his deceased father laughing and talking to him in a dream, this is a good omen for him and good news that he will find a new job that will give him a good and abundant livelihood, and he will enjoy a high position and a high status in the play. If the dreamer is angry and sad and sees in his dream that he is visiting the grave of a friend of his, then he sees his deceased friend laughing with him and talking to him. This is evidence of the disappearance of his anxiety, his relief from his distress and pain, and his ability to solve all the difficulties and problems that plagued him in his life. While a man sees his deceased brother in a dream and they are laughing together, this vision indicates that the dreamer will obtain a good job opportunity, and his financial circumstances will improve, and if If he is in debt, he will be able to spend it. And if a man sees in a dream that he is visiting his mother’s grave and crying over her, and seeing his mother next to him, laughing with him and talking to him, this is good news to the dreamer that his condition will be corrected and improved, and he will be blessed in it. His life and the abundance of goodness for him. Since seeing a man in a dream shows his father dead, and he saw that he was talking to him about something and saw his father laughing at him, this indicates the validity of this matter, while beingware of the difficulties and machinations that the fortuneteller may face due to the grudge and hatred of some people towards the fortuneteller. Interpretation of dreams of the dead man laughing with me for singles. An unmarried woman’s vision of her dead father in her dream, and that he laughs with her and talks to her and she is happy with that and feels joy, indicates the blessing of her coming life, her happiness, and the achievement of many good things. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream crying over the death of her brother, and her brother is laughing and talking to her. This symbolizes the achievement of the dreamer’s goals and his success in doing everything he wants. It also explains the individual vision of a dead man laughing at her, but she does not know him and feels tense and worried about him, with her academic excellence, success, and obtaining the highest grades. If an unmarried woman sees a dead friend in her dream, but she cried while she was You talk to her. This is a sign to her that she is in good health and that she has a great source of livelihood or a lot of money. If a girl sees a dead man laughing with her, it is interpreted by humility, good morals, and good behavior for this girl. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about dead people eating sweets in a dream from senior imams. Interpretation of a dream about a dead man laughing Ali from a married woman: Seeing a married woman with a dead man laughing with her in her dream indicates the stability of this person’s life

title: I dreamed that my sister was pregnant and she was not married to Ibn Sirin 2021

preview.html: I dreamed that my sister was pregnant and she was not married. Pregnancy is one of the things that bodes well, as it promises the woman that she will become a mother and that she will feel the beauty of sensation, and the news of pregnancy is joyful for all family members, especially for those who become aunts. This dream and what can be interpreted. Today and until today, different, we will review: I dreamed that my sister was pregnant and she was not married, and what is its interpretation according to the most prominent scholars. Follow us. I dreamed that my sister was pregnant and she was single. In general: A young man says that I dreamed that my sister was pregnant and not married, so this dream indicates that the owner of this vision He seeks to achieve his goals and aspirations and that he will achieve them, God willing. Some scholars have interpreted that seeing pregnancy in a dream is a dream that does not bode well and may indicate the burden of worries and problems, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl dreams that her married sister is pregnant, this means that this dreaming girl will live A life full of happiness, kindness and joy. If a girl dreams that her unmarried sister is pregnant, this means that she is suffering from worries and problems, but those worries and problems will be solved and she will be liberated, God willing. Click on the picture to go to the store and complete the purchase. I dreamed that my sister is pregnant and married to Ibn Sirin: If The girl dreamed that her married sister was pregnant, then this indicates that the woman will receive very good and abundant food in the near future, and God knows best. The dream of a pregnant married sister is also interpreted as being good and for a partnership in a new business through which she will obtain a lot of money. If Someone dreams that his older sister has become pregnant, this means that this sister is distracted from worldly matters, tied to them, far from her religion, and needs to repent to God. Read also: Pregnancy experiences after hysterosalpingography The best time to have sex after an injection to get pregnant with a boy Why did I dream that my sister was pregnant and unmarried: There are many interpretations in which I interpreted a dream that my sister was pregnant and unmarried, and among these interpretations is: If a man dreams that his sister is pregnant and unmarried, this means that his dreams, goals, and aspirations will come true, and God knows best. If a girl dreams that her unmarried sister is pregnant, this means that these The pregnant girl will suffer from worries and problems, but soon they will be resolved and released, God willing. If one dreams that his sister is pregnant and the birth is near, and that girl is not married, this means that that girl bears a lot of responsibilities and it can also be interpreted that she will earn an abundant living and enjoy With a life full of vitality. Joy and happiness, and God knows best. I dreamed that my sister was pregnant and not married to twins: A dream about twins was interpreted for one girl as follows: If a girl dreams that her sister is pregnant with twins, then this is an unpleasant dream, as most scholars interpret it, and this dream can indicate many worries, problems, and sorrows, and God knows best. If a girl dreams that her unmarried sister is pregnant while she is a student, this indicates the difficulties and difficulties she faces in her studies, and God knows best. If a girl dreams that her unmarried sister is pregnant with twins, a boy and a girl, this means that she is facing a financial problem, and God knows best. If a girl dreams that her unmarried sister is pregnant with twins, a boy and a girl, this means that she is facing a financial problem, and God knows best. If a girl dreams that her sister is pregnant, The married woman is pregnant with twins and her gender

title: Seeing coins in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: In dreams, divine messages come to us that can be a warning or good news, and this contains our topic today from your website gptafser.com/, who sees coins in a dream.Interpretation of seeing coins in a dream for a single girlWhen an unmarried girl sees Coins in her dream symbolize collecting a lot of money in the coming period, and God knows best. Perhaps seeing coins is a bad sign for her that there are people who talk about them in unfavorable terms. Seeing coins indicates success in one’s business. Collecting coins in her dream symbolizes collecting a lot of money in the coming period, and God knows best. Coins in her dream symbolize the fulfillment of her desires and desires and she also has power. Seeing a girl in her dream collecting coins is an indication of her poor mental state due to the seizures that afflict her, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. In the event that he sees green coins, this dream is nothing but a sign that indicates that she will get married. From a wealthy and prosperous man, God willing. When she sees herself paying money and it was coins, this indicates the bad news that she will hear. In contrast to seeing her receiving or receiving coins, this indicates good and happy news that will come her way, God willing. But if Someone in a dream gives her coins, as this may be a sign of her upcoming engagement. Perhaps this is the one who gave her her money and knowledge from God Almighty. See also: Interpretation of dreams of many coins. Interpretation of seeing coins in a dream for a married woman. A married woman sees in a dream that she is collecting coins. From the ground. A sign that she is a woman who has a lot of luck and livelihood coming, God willing. But if she sees herself taking notes. It symbolizes that her husband will get a job from which he will gain a high social status, God willing. When a woman sees in a dream coins with paper money. This He does not deserve praise, as it symbolizes that he will suffer from problems in life, and God knows best. As for burying money, this woman may suffer from a bad financial situation, God willing, God knows best. Finding banknotes for a married woman is a beautiful sign for her that she will have a great living. And a friend In a dream she gives her banknotes. This dream symbolizes that he has a wonderful and loyal friend. He defends her in her absence and he has to maintain this really beautiful friendship. In case he sees coins in a dream. Maybe it is a good sign for her that she is fine because of her financial situation Wonderful, and God knows best. Also, seeing coins is a sign of good health that you enjoy without illness. Sadness over the loss of money for a married woman in a dream is unacceptable, because it symbolizes that she is going through crises. Counterfeit coins are an indication of hypocrisy, and God knows best. Interpretation of the vision Coins in a dream about a man and their meaningIf one sees coins in a dream, this is a sign of a change in circumstances. It will be better than this situation in which he reaches his status.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dress

preview.html: We know very well that a dress is one of the things that is the symbol of female elegance, so when she sees it in a dream, the girl wants to explain what she saw in order to confirm it. A woman who sees a dress in a dream is often an elegant woman in her personal life. Interpretation of a dream about a dress in a dream for a single woman. Interpretations of seeing a dress vary depending on the color it appears in. If the dress is white, this is evidence that the groom will come to her soon and will be a person with great respect, religiosity, and morals. Hamida. If the dress is blue, this indicates that the groom will get a lot of money and live a prosperous life. But if you see a red dress in a dream, this is evidence that the groom has arrived for this girl, but she has been married before. Seeing a black dress is the opposite interpretation of a blue dress. Whereas the poor groom does not have money or prestige. But if the girl sees that she is looking for the dress on the wedding day, this is evidence that she is distracted by some of the things she is going through. Interpretation of a dream about a dress in a dream for a pregnant woman. Only God Almighty does not know what is inside the womb, but there are indications and signs. A pregnant woman must know the type of fetus she will give birth to, and this can be done by seeing the dress in a dream, as a short dress is evidence that this woman was born female, and a long dress indicates that it will be male. Interpretation of a dream about a dress in a dream for a married woman if A married woman saw a dress in her dream, which is evidence of her shortcomings in her married life. The long white dress is also evidence of the abundance of goodness and money that will be given to her, from this woman, very soon. Interpretation of a dream about a dress by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a dress in a dream as abundant goodness and that money will be received. It is also evidence that you hear good news, in If the dress is white and covers the woman's entire body and has drapery. A long white veil. We welcome reader questions at the bottom of the article. If you dream, write a comment below.

title: A dead person crying in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Of course, interpretations differ depending on the dreamer’s proximity to the deceased, as well as the nature of the dream, and this is what we will now distinguish you from our interpreter, so follow us. The interpretation of seeing the deceased crying in a dream for a single girl. The unmarried girl, if the father or mother, whom God blesses, cries in a dream. The interpretation of this vision indicates that their daughter is suffering from Poverty or adversity and hardship, and they feel that they are her guest. The scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing an unmarried woman in a dream whose deceased father came to her crying profusely. The interpretation of this is that this girl is exposed to great harm, or that she is suffering from poverty, severe distress, or illness, and is sad about the state she has reached. If the father is angry in the dream, his anger indicates his dissatisfaction with the actions she takes after his departure. If an unmarried girl sees her father dead in her dream, she cries. This vision is evidence of her illness, want, or poverty that his daughter suffers from. See also Interpretation of a dead person’s dream of taking the clothes of a living person and its meaning. Interpretation of seeing a dead person crying in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees her husband dead in a dream and cries, this indicates that he is angry with her. This is because crying is a sign of anger. He feels that his wife is cheating on him, which makes him sad because of what he sees of her actions. In general, the crying of a husband who died in his wife’s dream. This is what scholars interpret as an interpretation of his anger, indignation, and resentment over that. Any dream of a dead person crying is not a bad omen, but rather it could be a sign of paying old debts. Or they released someone’s wife or they released a prisoner. Among the interpretations of seeing a dead person crying in a dream is evidence of shortcomings in religion and shortcomings of greed that controls some people in this world. If this is accompanied by crying and wailing, and if the burial process is not completed and he is buried, then there is no good or good. If a widow sees her husband crying in her dream, it is a sign. It is a clear indication of his anger and hatred for her and her feeling of her betrayal, which made him cry. And if she saw her father in a dream that God died crying. The interpretation of this is the father’s feeling of his daughter’s suffering from illness, poverty, hardship, etc. Interpretation of seeing a dead person crying in a dream about a man and its meaning is seeing a dead person crying Unfortunately, it is considered a bad omen. It indicates that this man will be tormented in the afterlife for his evil. He must reconsider himself before it is too late, and God Almighty knows best. The dead person expresses to the man that he did bad deeds before his death and regretted them. It led him to destruction in the afterlife and a painful torment such as cutting off the uterus. And disobeying parents in this world and thus warns the living against doing the same thing. In general, a man sees a dead person crying in a dream. It is not a good sign and carries negative and not pleasant things. Also among the interpretations that were given to the jurists. About this dream is that this man will find In the afterlife, there is a great torment, and God knows it. A man who sees a dead person crying also indicates that he will cut his ties of kinship, and this is a bad sign. Read also: Interpretation of a dead person asking for candy in a dream. The meaning of seeing a dead person crying in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. It is considered seeing a pregnant woman from among the dead, and she was crying. In the vision. It is evidence from God and good news that God will facilitate childbirth for that woman. It will be

The interpretation of seeing the deceased crying in a dream for a single girl. The unmarried girl, if the father or mother, whom God blesses, cries in a dream. The interpretation of this vision indicates that their daughter is suffering from Poverty or adversity and hardship, and they feel that they are her guest. The scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing an unmarried woman in a dream whose deceased father came to her crying profusely. The interpretation of this is that this girl is exposed to great harm, or that she is suffering from poverty, severe distress, or illness, and is sad about the state she has reached. If the father is angry in the dream, his anger indicates his dissatisfaction with the actions she takes after his departure. If an unmarried girl sees her father dead in her dream, she cries. This vision is evidence of her illness, want, or poverty that his daughter suffers from. See also Interpretation of a dead person’s dream of taking the clothes of a living person and its meaning. Interpretation of seeing a dead person crying in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees her husband dead in a dream and cries, this indicates that he is angry with her. This is because crying is a sign of anger. He feels that his wife is cheating on him, which makes him sad because of what he sees of her actions. In general, the crying of a husband who died in his wife’s dream. This is what scholars interpret as an interpretation of his anger, indignation, and resentment over that. Any dream of a dead person crying is not a bad omen, but rather it could be a sign of paying old debts. Or they released someone’s wife or they released a prisoner. Among the interpretations of seeing a dead person crying in a dream is evidence of shortcomings in religion and shortcomings of greed that controls some people in this world. If this is accompanied by crying and wailing, and if the burial process is not completed and he is buried, then there is no good or good. title: Interpretation of seeing money distributed to relatives in a dream: a good or bad sign?

preview.html: Many people ask about the interpretation of seeing the distribution of money to relatives in a dream, which is one of the dreams that some believe portends livelihood, and a person’s opportunity to be lost to distribute money to his relatives around him, but this belief is wrong, as the world of dreams varies according to circumstances, and therefore, through our article that we present to you from the Encyclopedia, we will explain to you Interpretation of this dream.Interpretation of seeing money distributed to relatives in a dream. The dream of distributing money to relatives during the dream is considered, unanimously, one of the praiseworthy dreams that shows the goodness that the dreamer will receive. Here are some interpretations that explain the reality of this dream: Imam Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a person in a dream distributing money to relatives is a clear sign that the person will be freed from all his worries and sorrows in a short time and that the coming period of his life will be a good period. And if he sees that he is distributing Money is given to members of his relatives and family, as this indicates the extent of love, as well as the extent of the bond between him and his family. And if someone sees that he is dividing money among his relatives and he is sick in his home, this is a sign of the obligation of zakat for that person. It is possible that it is an indication of the joy and upcoming recovery for this person. Sick, and seeing the same person giving money to his relatives in a dream indicates the extent of closeness and reconciliation, if there is a difference of opinion and relatives. Seeing a person in a dream giving money to his relatives is an indication that there will be a difference between them and this money will be an inheritance that will be inherited. And seeing a person distributing Money given to his relatives among his children indicates the abundance of goodness that the dreamer will receive and a sign of the goodness that is in his heart. And seeing the same person distributing money while he is in need of this money is a sign that indicates the end of distress and goodness for him, God willing. Interpretation of seeing money in a dream according to Al-NabulsiImam Al-Nabulsi is considered one of the most famous scholars In the field of dreams and vision interpretation. If a person sees in a dream that he has obtained money and that this money is a piece of paper, this is evidence that God will bless him with a righteous child. And in the event that a man dreams in a dream that he has a piece of money but has lost it, in this message It shows the importance of donating his money to charitable organizations and contains a warning from God about the importance of a servant who performs his duties. When one sees in a dream that his money has decreased in this vision, this means that he will lose some money in a short time. And if one sees that he has acquired a large treasure, he will gain He has a lot of money and inheritance, but he will face some problems because of this money. And if a person sees that he is carrying a lot of banknotes and bragging about them in front of people, this is evidence that this person has committed some sins and evils that religion has forbidden. Interpretation of a dream about distributing money to relatives in In this paragraph, we will explain to you some different interpretations of the dream, distributing money to relatives and family. If someone sees that he is throwing money from his house to passers-by on the street and that the money is large, this is a sign that goodness will descend upon the house, as he will face many problems and worries, but all These worries will disappear and joy will reign

title: Interpretation of a dream about praying in a church. The meaning of praying in a church in a dream

preview.html: The dream of church prayer is for the single woman, and the pregnant woman is for the divorced woman, if a group dreams of praying in the mosque, and the dawn prayer facing other than the direction of the direction, and seeing a man praying according to Ibn Sirin, and more prayer. Interpretation of church prayer in a dream: If he dreams that he is praying in a church in straight rows, then they multiply in Glorifying and exalting the Almighty’s saying: “And we are pure, and we are the ones who come to the forefront.” If he dreams that he has left an obligatory prayer, then he is ignorant of some laws. Interpretation of church prayer in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is praying in a group, this is a good sign, as this vision shows the good that she will obtain in the near future without fatigue. Interpretation of church prayer in a dream for a woman The Married Woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is watching church prayers but completes her prayers alone, then this is a sign that she will fall into a crisis, but it will pass peacefully, God willing. Interpretation of church prayers in a dream about a pregnant woman. This vision in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates marital problems between her husband. The dream and her husband, but she will pass peacefully, if she sees that her husband wakes her up to pray but he is lazy. Interpretation of church prayer in a dream for a divorced woman. And if a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is watching church prayers and then prays with them, this is a sign of the great wealth that this woman will acquire in the coming period. Interpretation Church prayer in a man’s dream: Seeing a man praying in the church and then praying is evidence of the great sustenance that the man will obtain in his life. However, if he sees a woman who is not known to wake him up for the church, this is evidence of the presence of a person in the church. His life that helps him do good. Interpretation of a dream about prayer - YouTube

title: Interpretation of my sister-in-law’s dream about cleaning my house in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of my sister-in-law’s dream of cleaning my house in a dream has nothing to do with interpretations, but rather from diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of my husband’s sister’s dream of cleaning my house in a dream: Seeing my husband’s sister cleaning the house in a dream may mean that one will receive great help from her during this time, And God knows best. A dream about one’s sister-in-law cleaning the house in a dream may indicate that relations between them improved a lot during that period. If one sees one’s sister-in-law cleaning the house in a dream, this may indicate a great deal of livelihood that the woman may obtain during this period, and God knows best. If a woman sees that her sister-in-law was cleaning the house, this may indicate good events that may occur in her life in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams of my husband’s wife wearing my clothes in a dream. If a woman sees that her husband’s sister was wearing her clothes in a dream, This may indicate the strength of the relationship between them, thanks to God. If a woman saw that her husband’s sister was wearing her clothes, this may indicate the friendship and love that existed between them at that time. This vision may also indicate the comprehensive diet that the woman may obtain in the future. Those days, and God knows best. This vision may indicate the abundance of money and food that a woman can obtain in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of my husband’s sister’s dream of cutting her hair in a dream. Seeing my husband’s sister cutting her hair in a dream may indicate many changes in her life during those days. And God knows best. If a woman sees her husband’s sister cutting her hair, this may indicate that a lot of effort will be made to improve relations between them on those days. This vision may also indicate great material gains that the woman may obtain on those days. Seeing her husband’s sister Cutting her hair in a dream may indicate a change in events that may happen to her during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my husband’s sister reconciling with me in a dream Seeing my husband’s sister reconciling with his wife in a dream may mean that things will calm down and circumstances between them will calm down, thanks to God. If A woman saw that her husband’s sister reconciled with her in a dream, this may indicate the end of problems and differences between them. This vision could also indicate changing events that will occur in their lives during the coming period. In the case of dreaming of her husband’s sister who reconciled with the woman in a dream, it could indicate Until the end of the major problems and disagreements that appear between them during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams of my husband’s sister giving me food in a dream. The husband’s sister giving the woman food in a dream, which may indicate the great wealth that she may obtain in the coming days. Also, this vision may It indicates her great help and assistance during those days. If you see the husband’s sister offering food to the wife in a dream, this may indicate the effort she is making to resolve the differences and problems that exist between them. Seeing the husband’s sister offering food in a dream may indicate the arrival of kindness and the poor who He might get it in this period, I swear

title: Interpretation of seeing memorizing the Holy Qur’an in a dream

preview.html: Seeing memorizing the Holy Qur’an in a dream, the Holy Qur’an is the book of God Almighty revealed to His Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, 1400 years ago, and seeing memorizing the Holy Qur’an. The Qur’an in a dream can indicate goodness or it may be a warning or a warning against the emergence of evil, and interpreters differed in interpreting the vision of memorizing the Holy Qur’an in a dream, whether it is an unmarried woman. A married, pregnant or divorced woman with various meanings today through one of the visioning sites. We will discuss in detail the interpretation of the vision of memorizing the Holy Qur’an in a dream based on the opinion of seniors. Translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, or Imam Al-Sadiq follow us. Interpretation of seeing the Holy Qur’an in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing the Holy Qur’an reading Everything is forbidden. Dreaming of carrying the Qur’an and reading from it. The sick person is a sign of his recovery and the loss of the tired. Seeing the Qur’an in a dream announces goodness and blessings for the pioneer. Seeing the Holy Qur’an in a dream indicates the righteousness and piety of the dreamer. Interpretation of the vision of memorizing the Holy Qur’an for unmarried women. Seeing an unmarried woman reciting the Qur’an in a dream is evidence that God Almighty He protects her and protects her from all harm. Seeing single women memorizing verses of mercy and forgiveness is good news for her. Seeing an unmarried woman memorizing the Qur’an in a dream is evidence of fulfilling all your desires and achieving her goals easily. Interpretation of a dream of memorizing the Holy Qur’an for a married woman: A vision of a married woman memorizing the Qur’an indicates his righteousness and piety in reality. A dream about memorizing the Holy Qur’an for a married woman indicates that God will protect her from all harm and evil. Memorizing the Holy Qur’an in a dream announces blessings for the offspring, health and happiness in her life. Interpretation of a dream about reading the Holy Qur’an for a single woman. Watching the recitation of the Holy Qur’an for single women announces her character among her peers with sincerity, honesty, purity and good morals. A dream about reading The Holy Qur’an for a single woman in a dream is good news about a great reward coming. Seeing the Holy Qur’an being recited in a dream indicates a blessing for her in her life, and a good man’s pampering for marriage. Seeing a woman reading the Qur’an in a dream. A dream about a married woman reading the Holy Qur’an in a low voice indicates a new pregnancy with an infant. Seeing a married woman reading the Holy Qur’an out loud indicates that good news is coming to a fortune teller. A married woman sees her husband reciting the Holy Qur’an to her, which indicates protection for her and her family from the evil eye, envy and all evil. Interpretation of a dream about reading the Holy Qur’an for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman sees her husband reciting the Holy Qur’an in a dream. Remember that She has a male child. Seeing a pregnant woman reading the Holy Qur’an in a dream indicates the ease of childbirth for her and the health of her fetus. Seeing a man reading the Holy Qur’an in a dream A dream about reading the Holy Qur’an for a man indicates the goodness of the dreamer and the seriousness of his piety and religiosity. Seeing a man reading the Qur’an while praying out loud indicates that God Almighty His prayers are answered. A dream about someone reading the Qur’an announces his repentance for sins and sins
